FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice Activated Video Call Scheduling
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED shall allow users to schedule and initiate video calls with friends using voice commands. However, users will not be able to customize the video call interface, and it will not support scheduling for more than two participants.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Personalized Medication Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED shall provide personalized medication reminders through voice commands, allowing users to confirm adherence and customize reminders in frequency and type. Users can also customize the reminder tone and frequency but the reminder notifications will NOT support multi-device synchronization.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Cognitive Engagement Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to set daily reminders for cognitive exercises, such as puzzles and memory games, but it will only allow one reminder per day, conflicting with the flexibility of reminders offered for other tasks.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Step-by-Step Virtual Event Access
FunctionalRequirements.Description: ALFRED shall provide users with step-by-step guidance to access virtual community events, thereby reducing technology-related barriers.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User-Friendly Interface
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The ALFRED system shall have an intuitive and user-friendly interface that accommodates older adults with varying levels of technical expertise, ensuring easy navigation and operation.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Data Privacy Compliance
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The ALFRED system shall comply with relevant data privacy regulations, ensuring user data is securely handled and providing users with control over their personal information.
